ihathin sandahan kala pudgalayin athuluwa oostreliyawa ha japanaya da ema tharaga mala thama ratawalata laba ganimata kala haki sama balapamak ma kala athara rusiyawatath, katar rajyayatath ema kusalana pawathwima sandaha balaya dima gana mahathse kopayata pathwi thibina.esema 2018 loka kusalanaya pawathwima sandaha engalanthaya pawum miliyana 21 ka lansuwak idiripath karanu labu athara eya owunata sthira washayen ma labena bawata ee sandaha mahansi wu brithanya agamathi dewid kamaran, wiliyam kumaru ha papandu kridaka dewid bekam yana ayata poronduwak da labi thibina.eheth chanda wimasimedi kamituwe siti 22 denagen engalanthayata labi thibune ek chandayak pamani.loka kusalana dekak pilibanda thirana ganima ekawara sidu kirima da kageth sakayata hethuwak wi thibe.
ee nisa danata meheyawana nadu katayuthu pawa wenama adhikaranayak magin ki්rayawaliya wegawath karala waradakaruwanta danduwam paminawiya yuthuyi.

rajaya wisin aushadha warga 48ka welenda namayan 2300ka pamana mila adu kirima nisa me wanawita paudgalika aushadha welendasalwala dainika welendama 30% kin pahala basa athi bawa samastha lanka aushadhahal himiyange sangamaye maha lekam sampath shri kothalawala mahatha pawasa sitiyeya.
budurajanan wahansela, pase budurajanan wahansela, maha rahathan wahansela yana me loka dhathuwe durlabhama kalyana mithra aashraya oba labala thibenawa.
meka asadharanayak bawa da ee mahatha wadiduratath pawasiya.
me athara, rabar waga kirime katayuthu da 13.9% kin pahatha basa athi athara, karadiya dhiwara katayuthuwala da siyayata 2 ka pasubamak daknata labena bawa sandahan.
